sentences.en: Across TV and film, the underrepresentation of non-white characters falls mostly on Hispanics.
sentences.cn: 在电视和电影中，非白人角色的代表性不足主要集中在拉美裔。

sentences.en: MICHAEL NAZIR-ALI, 44, an assistant bishop in central London; as Bishop of Rochester, the first non-white diocesan bishop of the Church of England; in Kent.
sentences.cn: 44岁的迈克尔·纳泽尔-阿里是伦敦市中心的一名助理主教；作为罗彻斯特主教，他是英国国教首位非白人教区主教；在肯特郡。

sentences.en: In 1991 just 6.8% of the population was non-white.
